Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-42861 affecting package linuxptp for versions less than 3.1.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-42861 affecting package linuxptp for versions less than 3.1.1-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package linuxptp is earlier than 3.1.1-1, affected by CVE-2024-42861
